description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(776).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,390,0,0,0,-1).
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[776],30]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 09 2013 *)CoefficientList[Series[(27 + 28 x + 167 x^2 + 195 x^3 + 167 x^4 - 28 x^5 + 27 x^6 - x^7)/(1 - 390 x^4 + x^8), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 26 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 09 2013
